attributes.action: Make Royal Mail and other mailing companies respect the all NO JUNK MAIL signs.
attributes.background:
The Royal Mails current policy is to ignore its customers wishes on Junk mail and post unaddressed leaflets and mail regardless. All this policy achieves is irritate the occupier and waste environmental resources. 
Please force all delivery company to respect these signs.

rejection.details:
The Royal Mail is a private company, so the Government and Parliament don't have the power to force it to do this. 

You could start a new petition asking Parliament to change the law, to make it illegal for anyone to ignore junk mail signs.
